Articles.Content:
So my new laptop is a Windows machine, which is my first personal Windows computer in over a decade (though I use them for work daily). However, Win10 is new to me, along with the new "Edge" browser that replaces the venerable Internet Exploder ... er, "Explorer." It's been relatively painless so far but one burble I've run into is with the KSP Forums software. The Quote and Multi-Quote features are kind of wonky - sometimes the buttons work and the quoted posts appear in the text entry field but most of the time they don't. The same features work great in Chrome.

Is there some trick to this with Edge that I'm missing?

Thanks!

1 hour ago, LameLefty said:

So my new laptop is a Windows machine, which is my first personal Windows computer in over a decade (though I use them for work daily). However, Win10 is new to me, along with the new "Edge" browser that replaces the venerable Internet Exploder ... er, "Explorer." It's been relatively painless so far but one burble I've run into is with the KSP Forums software. The Quote and Multi-Quote features are kind of wonky - sometimes the buttons work and the quoted posts appear in the text entry field but most of the time they don't. The same features work great in Chrome.

Is there some trick to this with Edge that I'm missing?

Thanks!

I'm using windows 10, nothing bad happening with the quotes...

the only problem I've had is ultra-zooming

47 minutes ago, StupidAndy said:

I'm using windows 10, nothing bad happening with the quotes...

the only problem I've had is ultra-zooming

Okay, so I think I figured out my own problem. For whatever reason, I have to click in the actual text entry field, and THEN click the "Quote" button ... Do it that way and it works every time. If I simply click the "Quote" button on a post I want to reply to, it will take me to the text entry field but most often doesn't cause the quoted post to appear. Sometimes it does, but most of the time ... nada. In Chrome that doesn't matter.

Oh well. One of life's little mysteries.
